## Example QuestionnaireResponse: Vital Signs QuestionnaireResponse Example

* [LinkID](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table): VitalSignsQuestionnaireResponse
  * [Text](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table): 
  * [Definition](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table): 
  * [Answer](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table)![](data:image/png;base64,): Questionnaire:[Vital Signs Group (Repeating)](Questionnaire-VitalSignsQuestionnaire.md)
* [LinkID](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table): ![](icon-q-group.png)vitalSignsGroup
  * [Text](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table): Vital Signs Set
  * [Definition](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table): 
  * [Answer](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table)![](data:image/png;base64,): 
* [LinkID](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table): ![](icon-q-string.png)time
  * [Text](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table): 
  * [Definition](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table): 
  * [Answer](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table)![](data:image/png;base64,): 2025-09-25T09:55:00+08:00
* [LinkID](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table): ![](icon-q-string.png)respiratoryRate
  * [Text](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table): 
  * [Definition](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table): 
  * [Answer](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table)![](data:image/png;base64,): 22
* [LinkID](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table): ![](icon-q-string.png)respiratoryRateRhythm
  * [Text](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table): 
  * [Definition](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table): 
  * [Answer](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table)![](data:image/png;base64,): [not stated] regular: Regular
* [LinkID](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table): ![](icon-q-string.png)respiratoryRateBreathSounds
  * [Text](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table): 
  * [Definition](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table): 
  * [Answer](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table)![](data:image/png;base64,): [not stated] clear: Clear
* [LinkID](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table): ![](icon-q-string.png)pulseRate
  * [Text](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table): 
  * [Definition](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table): 
  * [Answer](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table)![](data:image/png;base64,): 88
* [LinkID](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table): ![](icon-q-string.png)pulseRateRhythm
  * [Text](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table): 
  * [Definition](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table): 
  * [Answer](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table)![](data:image/png;base64,): [not stated] regular: Regular
* [LinkID](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table): ![](icon-q-string.png)pulseRateQuality
  * [Text](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table): 
  * [Definition](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table): 
  * [Answer](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table)![](data:image/png;base64,): [not stated] strong: Strong
* [LinkID](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table): ![](icon-q-string.png)bloodPressureSystolic
  * [Text](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table): 
  * [Definition](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table): 
  * [Answer](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table)![](data:image/png;base64,): 120
* [LinkID](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table): ![](icon-q-string.png)bloodPressureDiastolic
  * [Text](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table): 
  * [Definition](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table): 
  * [Answer](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table)![](data:image/png;base64,): 80
* [LinkID](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table): ![](icon-q-string.png)temperature
  * [Text](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table): 
  * [Definition](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table): 
  * [Answer](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table)![](data:image/png;base64,): 37.2
* [LinkID](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table): ![](icon-q-string.png)levelOfConsciousness
  * [Text](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table): 
  * [Definition](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table): 
  * [Answer](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table)![](data:image/png;base64,): [not stated] alert: Alert
* [LinkID](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/formats.html#table): ![](data:image/png;base64,)Documentation for this format



## Resource Content

```json
{
  "resourceType" : "QuestionnaireResponse",
  "id" : "VitalSignsQuestionnaireResponse",
  "questionnaire" : "VitalSignsQuestionnaire",
  "status" : "completed",
  "subject" : {
    "reference" : "Patient/example"
  },
  "authored" : "2025-09-25T10:15:00+08:00",
  "item" : [
    {
      "linkId" : "vitalSignsGroup",
      "text" : "Vital Signs Set",
      "item" : [
        {
          "linkId" : "time",
          "answer" : [
            {
              "valueDateTime" : "2025-09-25T09:55:00+08:00"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "linkId" : "respiratoryRate",
          "answer" : [
            {
              "valueInteger" : 22
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "linkId" : "respiratoryRateRhythm",
          "answer" : [
            {
              "valueCoding" : {
                "code" : "regular",
                "display" : "Regular"
              }
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "linkId" : "respiratoryRateBreathSounds",
          "answer" : [
            {
              "valueCoding" : {
                "code" : "clear",
                "display" : "Clear"
              }
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "linkId" : "pulseRate",
          "answer" : [
            {
              "valueInteger" : 88
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "linkId" : "pulseRateRhythm",
          "answer" : [
            {
              "valueCoding" : {
                "code" : "regular",
                "display" : "Regular"
              }
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "linkId" : "pulseRateQuality",
          "answer" : [
            {
              "valueCoding" : {
                "code" : "strong",
                "display" : "Strong"
              }
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "linkId" : "bloodPressureSystolic",
          "answer" : [
            {
              "valueInteger" : 120
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "linkId" : "bloodPressureDiastolic",
          "answer" : [
            {
              "valueInteger" : 80
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "linkId" : "temperature",
          "answer" : [
            {
              "valueDecimal" : 37.2
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "linkId" : "levelOfConsciousness",
          "answer" : [
            {
              "valueCoding" : {
                "code" : "alert",
                "display" : "Alert"
              }
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}

```
